page.title: 10HUMBIE SCHOOL CLOSURE
page.content: LAST YEAR IT WAS PROPOSED TO CLOSE OUR SCHOOL.THIS WAS BECAUSE WE ONLY HAD FOURTEEN PUPILS AND THERE WAS SPARE ACCOMMODATION IN NEARBY SCHOOLS.THE PARENTS FORMED AN ACTION COMMITEE.TO FIGHT THE CLOSURE MONEY WAS NEEDED AND A COFFEE MORNING WAS HELD.LOTS OF COUNCILLORS VISITED THE SCHOOL TO SEE IF THEY THOUGHT IT SHOULD CLOSE. FORTUNATELY THEY DECIDED NOT TO CLOSE IT AND WE HAD A PARTY TO CELEBRATE.A SCHOOL IS IMPORTANT IN A COMMUNITY LIKE THIS AND IF IT HAD CLOSED EVERYONE WOULD HAVE NEEDED TO TRAVEL AND WE WOULD HAVE BEEN SPLIT UP FROM OUR FRIENDS.IT WAS ALSO FELT THAT YOUNG FAMILIES MIGHT NOT WANT TO LIVE HERE IF THERE WAS NO SCHOOL.
